++ Meego Install

    * Remove /etc/xdg/autostart
    * Remove mutter plugins (/usr/lib/mutter/plugins)

+++ Install dependences

    * libgdbus
    * libfakekey
    * yum (1.6M)
    * yum-utils
    * createrepo
    * alsa-utils (1.3M)
    * ppp
    * dmidecode

Note: scim-pinyin need be removed.
Note: Pre-installed scim-pinyin is ok.

Optional:

    * man (2.2M)
    * *rsyslog* (has problem?)
